item.title: Introducing Valt

item.title: Recognition Memory
item.description: The Power of Recognition Memory Take a quick look at the six images below. Now go back and imagine a single word description for each one. Really, do it. Say it out loud, even. You won’t be disappointed. Now, it may come as a surprise, but humans are freakishly good at recognizing images they’ve seen before. In fact, this is one reason Valt is so secure. We generate a random text-based password for you and then use your innate ability to recognize images to translate that password into a set of images.
